projects.title: Media Tracker
projects.description: It is a full stack website where user can find latest movies and tv series and details about it along with similar movies or series. User can save and manage list of watched movies and tv series. The data is provided by TMDB (https://www.themoviedb.org/).

projects.title: Birthday Notifier
projects.description: Full stack website to save birthdays and get email reminders on your registered email automatically.

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.description: Landing page website created to learn Bootstrap and SCSS. Tried to replicate the design.

projects.title: First Portfolio Website
projects.description: This is one of the first website that I created for improving my skills in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
